application.name: ActionScript Class Generator
application.author: Adobe
application.description: (1) Generate AS Class File from DB table (2) Generate AS Class File from an ORM CFC (specify Datasource, incase ORM CFC properties dont have datatype information specified ) (3) Generate AS Class File from Ordinary (non-ORM) CFC (DataSource mandatory) Note: You can also include the AIR-CF Offline suport feature's Metadata tags using this code generator
